title: filters
content: # `prefect.events.filters` ## Classes ### `AutomationFilterCreated` Filter by `Automation.created`. **Methods:** #### `model_validate_list` ```python theme={null} model_validate_list(cls, obj: Any) -> list[Self] ``` #### `reset_fields` ```python theme={null} reset_fields(self: Self) -> Self ``` Reset the fields of the model that are in the `_reset_fields` set. **Returns:** * A new instance of the model with the reset fields. ### `AutomationFilterName` Filter by `Automation.created`. **Methods:** #### `model_validate_list` ```python theme={null} model_validate_list(cls, obj: Any) -> list[Self] ``` #### `reset_fields` ```python theme={null} reset_fields(self: Self) -> Self ``` Reset the fields of the model that are in the `_reset_fields` set. **Returns:** * A new instance of the model with the reset fields. ### `AutomationFilter` **Methods:** #### `model_validate_list` ```python theme={null} model_validate_list(cls, obj: Any) -> list[Self] ``` #### `reset_fields` ```python theme={null} reset_fields(self: Self) -> Self ``` Reset the fields of the model that are in the `_reset_fields` set. **Returns:** * A new instance of the model with the reset fields. ### `EventDataFilter` A base class for filtering event data. **Methods:** #### `excludes` ```python theme={null} excludes(self, event: Event) -> bool ``` Would the given filter exclude this event? #### `get_filters` ```python theme={null} get_filters(self) -> list['EventDataFilter'] ``` #### `includes` ```python theme={null} includes(self, event: Event) -> bool ``` Does the given event match the criteria of this filter?
